language: This is the label used in the languages dropdown. Must be the native name of current language, starting with an upper char. '''Do not translate 'English' but write the native label for your language, e.g. Fran√ßais in French.'''

faq.whatIsZim: This is the question asking about the ZIM file format.
faq.whatIsZimDescParagraph: This is the answer about the ZIM file format. {0} is {{msg-kiwix|Zimit-ui-faq.whatIsZimDescLinkContent0}}.
faq.whatIsZimDescLinkContent0: This is the word(s) inside the link of {{msg-kiwix|Zimit-ui-faq.whatIsZimDescParagraph}}.
faq.howToRead: This is the question asking how to read ZIM files.
faq.howToReadDescLinkContent0: This is the word(s) inside the first link of {{msg-kiwix|Zimit-ui-faq.howToReadDescParagraph}}.
faq.howToReadDescLinkContent1: This is the word(s) inside the second link of {{msg-kiwix|Zimit-ui-faq.howToReadDescParagraph}}.
faq.missingContent: This is the question about incomplete or missing content in ZIM files.
faq.missingContentDesc: This is the answer about incomplete or missing content in ZIM files.
faq.gotError: This is the question about encountering error messages when using ZIM files.
faq.gotErrorDescParagraph: This is the answer about encountering error messages when using ZIM files.
faq.gotErrorDescLinkContent0: This is the word(s) inside the first link of gotErrorDescParagraph

timeLimit.singular: This is the singular form of the time unit.
timeLimit.plural: This is the plural form of the time unit.

footer.poweredByThankTo: This is the main page footer message, with placeholders for links.
footer.link2: Link text for {2} in {{msg-kiwix|Zimit-ui-footer.poweredByThankTo}}. See https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/moss/

header.donate: This is the text of a button to call for donations

newRequest.headingParagraph: This is the heading on home page allowing to create a new task.
newRequest.headingBold: This is the call to action displayed in bold. It is {0} in {{msg-kiwix|Zimit-ui-newRequest.headingParagraph}}.
newRequest.urlLabel: This is the label for the text box where users will be entering a URL.
newRequest.emailLabel: This is the label for the text box where users will be entering an optional email.
newRequest.submit: This is the text displayed on a button to start the request.
newRequest.advancedOptions: This is the text displayed on a button to display advanced options.
newRequest.fetchingDefinitionAndStatus: This is the message while fetching the task definition.
newRequest.errorFetchingDefinition: This is the message when fetching the task definition failed.
newRequest.errorFetchingStatus: This is the message when fetching the task status failed
newRequest.creatingRequest: This is the message while creating a Zimfarm request.
newRequest.errorCreatingRequest: This is the message when creating a Zimfarm request failed.
newRequest.offlinerNotFound: This is the message when we failed to load offliner definition through API call.
newRequest.stopNewRequestsMessage: This is the message when new requests can temporarily not be submitted anymore.

notFound.heading: This is the heading displayed when URL is not found/handled.
notFound.description: This is the description explaining the 404 error.

requestStatus.progressMessage:
{{optional}}
This is the text displayed inside the progress bar, using placeholders for percentage and status values
requestStatus.refreshing: This is the message when fetching task status is ongoing
requestStatus.errorRefreshing: This is the message when fetching task status failed
requestStatus.refreshAuto: This is the message indicating that page refresh is automated, with a placeholder for refresh interval.
requestStatus.zimingOf: These are the words before the website url ('Ziming' is an invented word, referring to the creation of files with a .zim extension, called ZIM files)
requestStatus.requestingSlot: This is the message indicating that system is requesting a slot to process the task
requestStatus.requestRecorded: These are explanations when the system is requesting a slot to process the task
requestStatus.rankMessage: This is the message indicating position of the task in the processing queue
requestStatus.requestFailed: This is the message indicating that the task has failed
requestStatus.failureReasons: These are explanations about what to do when a task has failed, including a placeholder for a link
requestStatus.failureReasonsLinkContent0: This is the content of the link on task failure explanation. It is {0} in {{msg-kiwix|Zimit-ui-requestStatus.failureReasons}}.
requestStatus.successMessage: This is the message indicating that the task has succeeded
requestStatus.successMessageExplanation: This is the explanations about what to do when task has succeeded.
requestStatus.successMessageButton: This is the text of the button allowing to download the ZIM file
requestStatus.partialZim: This is the warning text about a limit encountered during the processing, including a placeholder for a link
requestStatus.partialZimContactUsLink: This is the content of the link
requestStatus.beingProcessedMessage: This is the message indicating that the task is ongoing
requestStatus.beingProcessedExplanation: This is the explanation about the ongoing task
requestStatus.bookmarkUrl: This is a secondary explanation about the ongoing task
requestStatus.emailNotification: This is an explanation about what to do while task is processing when email has been provided
requestStatus.noEmailNotification: This is an explanation about what to do while task is processing when email has NOT been provided
requestStatus.settingsHeading: This is the title of the section detailing task settings
requestStatus.taskNotFound: This is the message displayed when the task is not found.
requestStatus.cancelButton: This is the text of cancel request button
requestStatus.requestCancelRequested: This is the title when task cancellation has been requested
requestStatus.requestCancelRequestedExplanation: This is the message when task cancellation has been requested
requestStatus.requestCanceled: This is the title when task has been cancelled
requestStatus.cancellingRequest: This is the message when task cancellation is ongoing
requestStatus.errorCancellingRequest: This is the popup message when task cancellation has failed

requested.subject: This is the email subject when task has been requested
requested.title: This is the email title (in body) when task has been requested
requested.zimRequestRecorded: This explains that task has been requested
requested.howToFollowProgress: This explains how to follow task progress
requested.emailWillBeSent: This explains that an email will be sent when task is done

succeeded.subject: This is the email subject when task has succeeded
succeeded.title: This is the email title (in body) when task has succeeded
succeeded.zimRequestCompleted: This explains that request has completed
succeeded.hereItIs: This is the text before the download link(s)
succeeded.incomplete: This is an optional email paragraph when task has succeeded but is incomplete
succeeded.contactUsLinkContent: This is the content of a link to contact us, used in 'incomplete' paragraph when task is incomplete. It is %{contactUsLink} in {{msg-kiwix|Zimit-ui-email.succeeded.incomplete}}.

failed.subject: This is the email subject when task has failed
failed.title: This is the email title (in body) when task has failed
failed.weAreSorry: This says that we are sorry for the failed task
failed.checkAndRetry: This explains that settings should be checked and retried
failed.retryLinkContent: This is the content of a link to try request again. It is %{retryLink} in {{msg-kiwix|Zimit-ui-email.failed.checkAndRetry}}/.
failed.howToCheckSettings: This explains how to double-check the settings

blockedRequest.blockedMissingReason: This is the message indicating the user is blocked for an unknown reason
blockedRequest.contactUsIfPersist: This is the message inviting the user to contact us if the situation persist
blockedRequest.zimitFreeService: This is the message explaining why there is a quota
blockedRequest.quotaReached: This is the message explaining what user should do when quota is reached
blockedRequest.useLinksBelowToSeeTask: This is the message explaining the list of ongoing tasks
blockedRequest.goToTask: This is the message inviting to open ongoing task
blockedRequest.excessiveUsage: This is a more generic message about quota being reached
blockedRequest.abnormalUsage: This is a generic error message when we fail to find quota information

blacklist.missingReason: This is the error message when the blacklist reason is missconfigured (bug)
blacklist.missingLibraryUrl: This is the error message when the library URL is missing in blacklist reason (bug)
blacklist.missingGithubIssueUrl: This is the error message when the Github issue URL is missing in blacklist reason (bug)
blacklist.goBack: This is the text on the go-back button
blacklist.contactUs: This is the message inviting users to contact us

alreadyZimed.alreadyMadeZim: This is the message indicating that ZIM has already been built
alreadyZimed.downloadFromLibrary: This is the message indicating that ZIM can be downloaded
alreadyZimed.downloadFromLibraryLinkContent: This is the textual content of the download link
alreadyZimed.wp1Hint: This is a message inviting users to test our WP1 tool
alreadyZimed.wp1LinkContent: This is the textual content of the link to WP1

tooBig.tooBigDetails: This is the message indicating that website is too big
tooBig.alreadyMadeZim: This is the message indicating that few ZIMs have already been built
tooBig.libraryLinkContent: This is the textual content of the download link {libraryLink} in {{msg-kiwix|Zimit-ui-blacklist.tooBig.downloadOrRequest}}
tooBig.githubRequestLinkContent: This is the textual content of the Github request link, {githubRequestLink} in {{msg-kiwix|Zimit-ui-blacklist.tooBig.downloadOrRequest}}
tooBig.useScraper: This is the message inviting user to use our scraper. {scraperLink} is replaced by {{msg-kiwix|Zimit-ui-blacklist.tooBig.scraperRepoLinkContent}}
tooBig.scraperRepoLinkContent: This is the textual content of the link to the scraper

blacklist.notPossible: This is the message indicating that it is not possible to ZIM this website
blacklist.scraperNeeded: This is the message indicating that we intend to build a dedicated scraper
blacklist.scraperNeededLinkContent: This is the textual content of the link to the dedicated Github issue
